mapper.update: update wallet set balance=balance-#{expPay}-#{expGive}, pay_balance=pay_balance-#{expPay}, give_balance=give_balance-#{expGive} where mem_no=#{memNo} and balance>#{expPay}+#{expGive}
mapper.select: select mem_no,ifnull(balance,0) as balance ,pay_balance,give_balance from wallet where mem_no=#{memNo} limit 1;
